[vc_row class_row=”page–hasTop”][vc_column][vc_row_inner is_container=”true”][vc_column_inner el_class=”d-sm-block d-none” width=”1/3″ tablet_width=”1″]

/01
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ tablet_width=”10″ phone_width=”12″]

ecommerce

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_row_inner is_container=”true”][vc_column_inner el_class=”order-sm-0 order-2 ml-sm-0 ml-auto” width=”1/4″ desktop_width=”1″ tablet_width=”2″ phone_width=”6″][vc_column_text el_class=”desc__still text-sm-left text-right mp-0 js-animation–lines” offset_animation=”data-offset=“.2“” offset_onscreen_animation=”.4″]Bison®
services
/01[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”d-lg-block d-none” width=”1/4″ desktop_offset=”2″ desktop_width=”1″] [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”order-sm-1 order-0 text-sm-left text-center services-section__desc mb-sm-0 mb-4″ width=”1/4″ desktop_offset=”2″ desktop_width=”5″ tablet_offset=”1″ tablet_width=”8″ phone_width=”12″][vc_column_text el_class=”desc__medium text-uppercase mp-0 js-animation–lines mb-2″ offset_animation=”data-offset=“.5“” offset_onscreen_animation=”.8″]As competition increases and commoditization draws closer, businesses must strengthen their positions by fully embracing the depth and richness of their brands’ touchpoints. An eCommerce store must speak the same language and communicate in the same way that a physical store does.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”text-gray js-animation–fade” offset_animation=”data-offset=“.6“” offset_onscreen_animation=”1.2″]People are at the forefront of all that we do when it comes to designing an eCommerce platform. Through digital strategy, design, and tech we focus on creating digital experiences that connect brands with their customers and drive sales.

Our team of experts have produced an impressive portfolio over the years for both traditional ‘brick and mortar’ business and online only operations. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”ml-sm-auto order-sm-2 order-1″ width=”1/4″ desktop_width=”auto” tablet_width=”auto” phone_width=”auto”]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_row_inner is_container=”true”][vc_column_inner]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner is_container=”true” class_row=”mt-1″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”2″][vc_column_text el_class=”desc__still text-left mp-0 js-animation–lines”]/We specialize in building
high performing eCommerce
websites that are enjoyable
and drive sales/[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”ml-auto” width=”1/2″ desktop_offset=”3″ desktop_width=”6″ phone_width=”auto”]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row is_container=”true”][vc_column width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”4″ tablet_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″ el_class=”mb-sm-0 mb-4″][vc_custom_heading text=”explore
the process” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”font-bold text-uppercase js-animation–chars”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ desktop_offset=”2″ desktop_width=”6″ tablet_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”mb-lg-0 mb-3″ width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″]

1

Ecommerce Strategy

Work with our team of experts to build out growth plans, funnel analysis, business planning, user personas, storyboards and conduct audits – where we’d assess the requirements and objectives around the project.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”mb-lg-0 mb-3″ width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″]

2

User Experience & Design

Our award-winning team brings eCommerce best practices, customer-centric design, and engaging creatives that drive sales and increase conversions. Our passion is developing beautiful on-brand, easy-to-use websites that customers truly enjoy.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_row_inner class_row=”mb-2″][vc_column_inner el_class=”mb-lg-0 mb-3″ width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″]

3

Ecommerce Development

We design and build exceptional websites and create outstanding eCommerce experiences on any platform. From custom builds to Woocommerce platforms, we specialize in the marriage of data-driven best practices and high-end creative to create truly unique sites that help your business grow.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″]

4

Convertion Rate Optimization

We will work with you to create a plan without a new monthly expenditure. The goal is to define the customer journey, set a baseline, and provide a strategic CRO plan. Including test creation, implementation, analysis, and planning.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner is_container=”true”][vc_column_inner]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

featured works

/05

Floreal

Strengthen their digital presence by offering a whole new eCommerce experience that meets their customers’ growing needs to shop flowers online.

  • E-Commerce

Boost

High quality natural and organic products.

  • E-Commerce

Bukkun

Malta’s first local food company for kids!

  • Digital Products
  • E-Commerce
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
